Description of incident: A missing piece                of luggage belonging to a state auditor contains the personal information                of 61 Brevard Public Schools employees and had district personnel                scrambling before the holiday weekend began to notify people that                their names and Social Security numbers might be compromised.             UPDATE (9/21/07):                Melbourne International Airport police arrested a 44-year-old defense                subcontractor from California on charges of stealing luggage. He                is in the Brevard County Jail, facing at least two charges of grand                theft.
